arts.ttl: Wolves reject £50m Strand Larsen bid from Newcastle
arts.sum: Wolves have rejected a £50m bid from Newcastle for Jorgen Strand Larsen.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Liverpool Preview: Premier League, Gameweek 2, 2025
arts.sum: For the first time since the 24/25 Carabao Cup final, Newcastle United will face Liverpool as both sides will look to build on their results in gameweek one of the competition. This game provides Anthony Gordon with a big chance to make himself the face of Newcastle United after Isak's saga has significantly damaged his reputation on Tyneside.

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak Custody Battle Could Have Been Avoided—Now Liverpool Must Face the Music
arts.sum: The atmosphere at St James' Park will be filled with tension and needle. Isak will have a watching brief as it all unfolds.

arts.ttl: Inside Alexander Isak's feud with Newcastle as striker misses out on Liverpool audition
arts.sum: Alexander Isak is the big talking point ahead of Newcastle's meeting with Liverpool in the Premier League on Monday night with the striker in no man's land ahead of the transfer deadline

arts.ttl: Liverpool star not spotted with squad ahead of Newcastle clash in potential blow for Reds
arts.sum: Liverpool facing a huge game against Newcastle at St James' Park as they look to pick up their second win of the Premier League season - but they could have another worry in their squad

arts.ttl: Arne Slot gives five-word response to Newcastle fans' anger over Alexander Isak saga
arts.sum: Liverpool take on Newcastle on Monday evening in a Premier League game that has taken on a fresh complexion amid Alexander Isak’s desire to complete a sensational switch to Liverpool

arts.ttl: Newcastle vs. Liverpool – Eddie Howe: Pre-Match Press Conference
arts.sum: Newcastle United host Liverpool on Monday night amid the never-ending Alexander Isak saga, with the striker still unavailable, refusing to join his teammates or ever play again for the Magpies, and seeking a move to Anfield. Eddie Howe’s side began their season with a goalless draw at Aston Villa and have now gone three Premier […]

arts.ttl: Liverpool XI vs Newcastle United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool face their first significant test as defending champions on Monday night as they travel to St James’ Park to take on Newcastle United. Arne Slot’s side are aiming to build on their opening-day victory and continue their title defence. arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Liverpool – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Newcastle United host reigning champions Liverpool in a pulsating Premier League clash at St James’ Park on Monday night. However, the fixture is overshadowed by the transfer saga surrounding Newcastle’s star striker, Alexander Isak. arts.ttl: 'I played for Liverpool and Newcastle, but only one will always have my heart'
arts.sum: Michael Owen played for a number of Premier League clubs, including Newcastle United and Liverpool - but only one of these sides truly has his heart
